casebody.data:
WALKER, et al.
v.
DRIVEN HOLDINGS, LLC 395A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 David C. Boggs, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Colin R. Stockton, Attorney at Law, for Walker, Ken, et al. Michael W. Mitchell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Driven Holdings, LLC

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of February 2018 by Kimberly A. Haviv for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
